post.body: Interesting. Very cool of you to create a video of this.
Stanza is rather nifty.
I hear ya. ;-)
Mother in law wisdom: We need elderly friendly computing cuz when I'm 70 I don't want to be using a system design by 20 year old.
Never realized how heavy the Thompson Twins bass was. It's not great bass playing ala Marcus Miller, just really heavy.
Gonna be a good little developer today and spend some time caring for my tools. In other words, I'm gonna read the docs.
Up early (4 AM). Quick email and feed check and then onto some multithreading cocoa madness.
Spending the holiday's creating a Cocoa front end to CouchDB.
objective-c seems to be missing a library/framework repo like CPAN, Maven, RubyGems. I wonder why? Seems like table stakes for a language.
Thank you, Chris Hanson, for explaining xcode's seemingly impenetrable unit testing facility.
Going to spend the day learning about Cocoa's Text system. Wish me luck.
Watching a FluidDB video. More confirmation that old school RDMS and SQL are dying.
iPhone app number one is feature complete. It's ugly, but done. Now onto a bigger challenge.
Switching from work mode to entertain-me mode. Time for some Dr. Who.
Researching LLVM, checking news, waking up.
I always thought playing Dreidel during Hanukkah was a little strange but the chocolate gelt was yummie. I've never been much of a gambler.
IT Architect or professional shopper? Sometimes I can't tell the difference.
I've been in 3 enterprise architecture meetings today and in each case Economic Downturn is the word of the day.
sudo pmset -a hibernatemode 0 .... nifty. Like coffee for your laptop.
Rick Warren invited to give Obama's invocation? Change, huh?
